How many people are affected by gnathodiaphyseal dysplasia ?,"The prevalence of gnathodiaphyseal dysplasia is unknown, but it is thought to be a rare disorder. A few affected individuals and families have been described in the medical literature.",GHR,gnathodiaphyseal
